Hello, I am working on the part of my practicum that is "Theme fields
The theme must have at least 2 theme fields to control the font and the accent color used in the header and footer".

I have created a module to plug into my header, which is attached. The fields for changing color and text are not changing when I change them through the website builder. I am new to building html, css, with hubl and the developer tools. I have added in my style fields to the fields.json file. Any assistance with this or help on creating theme fields to control font and access color would be great.
